page.title: 09HIGH ST./EXETER RD. HONITON
page.content: OUR AREA (THE WEST END) INCLUDED A GREAT VARIETY OF SHOPS & BUILDINGS FROM THE VERY OLD TO THE VERY MODERN. IT INCLUDED:{HOOKS}(butchers-run by Mr.Hughes & his wife who also make large quantities of pies & pasties- 3,000 per week. They employ 8 people) {BROCKWELL BOOKS}(stock of 50,000 second-hand books in its 3 storey building){NORTH'S BAKERY}(employs 5 and makes 400 loaves of bread per day) {WESSEX HIRE}(hires out small machinery){PANDORAS BOX}(antique shop) {TAYLORS ESTATE AGENT}(40 customers per day, in old cinema){CRANFORD DAIRY} (general store){AMITY}(hairdresser){ {YVONNE'S DEN}(children's clothing){ {SLADES}(horticultural/agrigcultural supplies){POLICE STATION}(20 years old,15 men & 2 women,4 marked cars, 1 unmarked,1 motor scooter,1 cell-can keep prisoners 1 night,4 police houses
